Reviews.Title: “Small Boutique, reasonable option but not super”

Reviews.Content: stay hotel close office paris option 13 nights altough found price pay 200 euro standard nicely furnished somewhat smallish flatscreen maximum 26 inch library bar breakfast limited opinion baquette croissant pain au chocolat cheese ham breakfast basement overall ok nights stay close office otherwise prefer airy hotel breakfast pay 200 euronight

Reviews.Title: “Excellent location, lovely rooms and overall great Hotel for Paris!”
Reviews.Author: WeeBean
Reviews.Content: paris stayed la lavoisier hotel opera district 3 nights struggled hotel reviews scared poor quality hotels extortionate prices paris hotel due reviews immediately impression lovely facade reception bedrooms nicely decorated parisien hotel clean staff friendly english liked safe teacoffee facilities 4 star hotel price reasonable paris £300 3 nights location safe close lovely restaurants metro 15 minutes walk opera de la concord definitely recommend hotel
